text: Brickellia extranea is a Mexican species of flowering plants in the daisy family. It is native to western Mexico in the state of Jalisco.McVaugh, Rogers 1972. Contributions from the University of Michigan Herbarium 9(4): 378-379, figure 6 description in Latin, commentary in English, line drawing on page 379 ==References== extranea Category:Flora of Jalisco Category:Plants described in 1972
title: Brickellia extranea
